overview: While our Celeste and Jeanna fight for the right to take charge of Bad Girls, the biker gang that could frighten the hell out of a Hell's Angel, town bullies start a war, leaving the girls no choice but to unite for the challenge. They grab their weapons - the ones under their shirts and between their legs and teach those big bad boys a lesson they won't forget!
title: Bad Girls 6: Ridin' Into Town
